analysis.description:
QuasacoinTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x48299b98d25c700e8f8c4393b4ee49d525162513.sol#481-499) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x48299b98d25c700e8f8c4393b4ee49d525162513.sol#497)

QuasacoinTokenCrowdsale.mintProxyWithoutCap (/unique_chucks/5/0x48299b98d25c700e8f8c4393b4ee49d525162513.sol#546-548) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x48299b98d25c700e8f8c4393b4ee49d525162513.sol)

QuasacoinTokenCrowdsale.mintProxy (/unique_chucks/5/0x48299b98d25c700e8f8c4393b4ee49d525162513.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/5/0x48299b98d25c700e8f8c4393b4ee49d525162513.sol)
